original: Just, Ernst Wilhelm, ingenjör, Borås, f. 6/11/87 i Vöslan, Osterr., av Franz Wilhelm J. o. Elisabeth Kretzschmar. G. 1. 21-45 m. Edit Gran-löf; 2. 46 m. A^artha Rietz f. Pinsky. Barn: Emst-Wakher f. 22, Barbro 24, Hans 3il. — Hand:sk. i Asch 02-03, ex. v. Borås tekn. elem :sk. (spec:elev i kemi) 08. Prakt. stud. i Asch 02-03, färgerivolontär i Elber-feld 08-09, färgmäst. i W. Just’s Färgeri 10-15, led. o. inneh. av E. W. Just’s Färgeri i Borås sed. 15. Led. av styr. f. Borås Sparbank o. KAK, fd. kassör o. ordf. i Borås ork :fören., fd. kassör i RotarykL, medl. av Par Bricole, SHT o. Odd Fellow. Hob-bies: musik (spec. violin), bilkörning. SORstGM, Fiats stGM.
translated: Just, Ernst Wilhelm, engineer, Borås, born on November 6, 1887 in Vöslau, Austria, to Franz Wilhelm J. and Elisabeth Kretzschmar. Married 1st in 1921 to Edit Gran-löf; 2nd in 1946 to A^artha Rietz, born Pinsky. Children: Emst-Wakher, born 1922, Barbro, born 1924, Hans, born 1931. Held a diploma from Asch 1902-1903, graduated from Borås Technical School (specializing in chemistry) in 1908. Practical studies in Asch 1902-1903, worked as a dyeing apprentice in Elberfeld 1908-1909, worked as a color master in W. Just's Dyeing Company 1910-1915, became a member and owner of E. W. Just's Dyeing Company in Borås since 1915. He was a member of the board of directors for Borås Savings Bank and KAK, former treasurer and chairman of Borås orchestra association, former treasurer of Rotary Club, and a member of Par Bricole, SHT, and Odd Fellow. His hobbies included music (especially playing the violin) and driving cars. awarded the Royal Order of the Polar Star, and awarded the Fiat Order of Merit.
